name: SQL
short: A cog that interacts with different databases.
description:
A cog that interacts with different databases.
Current databases: MySQL

Planned databases: MongoDB, PostgreSQL
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the SQL cog from OofCogs. This cog requires a little setup, please go to https://github.com/OofChair/OofCogs/blob/master/sql/README.md#installation to read the setup instructions. If you need any help with the setup process or find a bug, please join the support server here: <https://discord.com/invite/3PfU5q22wN>
